name: griffiss-institute
long-name: Griffiss Institute (in service of the Air Force Research Laboratory (AFRL)
duties: Updated ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) program suite, utilizing Python and Java
Designed and developed standalone Python-based PDF ETL suite from the ground up
